name: rules_erlang 3.14.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove duplicate setup in WORKSPACE.bazel by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/243
* Adopt latest rabbitmq-server-buildenv:linux-rbe for RBE by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/244
* Enhance erlang package resolution by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/246


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.13.2...3.14.0

body:

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.13.1...3.13.2

name: rules_erlang 3.13.0
body:

name: rules_erlang 3.12.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Avoid generating some extra app.bzl content when erlang_no_tests directive is applied by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/229
* No longer require sha256sum cli tool to be present on the host by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/228
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/230
* Upgrade gazelle by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/231
* Update gazelle/deps.bzl by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/234
* Bump ncipollo/release-action from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/233
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/232
* Gazelle code parser enhancements by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/235


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.11.4...3.12.0

name: rules_erlang 3.11.2
body:
## What's Changed
* With internal erlangs, only expand erlang if necessary by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/223
* Adopt latest rabbitmq-server-buildenv:linux-rbe for RBE by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/224

name: rules_erlang 3.11.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Log internal erlang build failures inline by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/217
* Fix use of ez_deps attr on erlang_bytecode rules by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/219
* Support directories passed as modules to app_file rule by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/221
* escript_archive rule allows ebin dirs by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/222
* hex_package patches by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/220


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.11.0...3.11.1

name: rules_erlang 3.11.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Allow multiple erlang builds to be unpacked simultaneously by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/214
* Improve validation of test suites when using sharding by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/215
* Expose additional erlang_build opts through the erlang_config repo by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/216


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.10.7...3.11.0

body:

* match dependency versions across bzlmod and the workspace by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/198

name: rules_erlang 3.10.0
body:
This release updates the names of the toolchains in the generated `@erlang_config` repo, so if your project has defined and registered named erlangs, such as `"@erlang_config//24:toolchain"` & `"@erlang_config//24:toolchain2"`, they are now generated as `"@erlang_config//24:toolchain_major"` & `"@erlang_config//24:toolchain_major_minor"`. The new names are easier to make sense of when debugging toolchain resolution.

## What's Changed
* A few bits of cleanup by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/190
* Correct the contents of 'registered' key in .app files by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/192
* Drop the source_archive macro by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/164
* `.ez` support by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/175


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.14...3.10.0

name: rules_erlang 3.9.14
body:
## What's Changed
* Mark "deps" as mergable by gazelle for a number of rules by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/182
* Track gazelle:excludes for resolving umbrella apps correctly by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/183
* Add a directive for resolving erlang apps explicitly in gazelle by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/184
* Do not generate wildcard (glob/native.glob) "srcs" in gazelle by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/187
* Add generated files to BUILD files for rebar projects by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/188


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.13...3.9.14

name: rules_erlang 3.9.13
body:
## What's Changed
* Allow test suites to -include_lib the subject under test by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/179
* Always insert load statements at index 0 in app.bzl files by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/181


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.12...3.9.13

name: rules_erlang 3.9.12
body:

* Add new attrs to the plt rule by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/178


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.11...3.9.12

name: rules_erlang 3.9.11
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix -include_lib statements referring to an app itself by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/168
* gazelle: add support for `{chatterbox, {pkg, ts_chatterbox}}` style deps in rebar.config files by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/167
* gazelle: GenFiles take precedence over files found on disk by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/170
* Add a rule for generating a moduleindex.yaml without gazelle by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/173
* Bump peter-evans/create-pull-request from 4.2.3 to 4.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/171
* Adopt latest rabbitmq-server-buildenv:linux-rbe for RBE by @github-actions in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/172


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.10...3.9.11

name: rules_erlang 3.9.10
body:
## What's Changed
* Add erlang_app_testonly directive by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/162
* Mark plt rules as "testonly" by default by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/163
* gazelle: compact rules use wildcard by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/166


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.9...3.9.10

name: rules_erlang 3.9.8
body:
## What's Changed
* Allow gazelle to merge the values attr of erlc_opts rules by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/155
* Fixup rebar_config_to_json.sh to not crash on `src_dirs` option by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/156
* gazelle: erlang_app extra_apps will no longer contain deps by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/157
* gazelle: exclude directives are honored when resolving local deps by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/158


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.7...3.9.8

name: rules_erlang 3.9.7
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix the erlang_erlc_opt directive by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/147
* Do not escape erlc_opts in erlang_bytecode2 rule by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/140
* Also consider the erlang_erlc_opt directive when parsing sources by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/148
* Add a --recurse_with flag to update repos by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/149
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.5.0 to 0.7.0 in /test by @dependabot in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/151
* Drop custom rule merge logic for app.bzl files by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/152
* Force certain generated attributes to be multi-line by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/153
* Avoid adding empty srcs attrs to filegroup rules from gazelle by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/154


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.6...3.9.7

name: rules_erlang 3.9.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix broken `-I` arg in erlang_bytecode rule when used in the root pkg by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/146


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.5...3.9.6

name: rules_erlang 3.9.5
body:

* Flatten erlc outputs into the ebin dir by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/141

* Parse tuple expressions in erl_attrs_to_json.sh by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/143
* gazelle: find calls within maps when parsing sources by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/144
* gazelle: find calls within try statements by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/145
* Gazelle: compact erlang_bytecode rules option by @pjk25 in https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/pull/138


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rabbitmq/rules_erlang/compare/3.9.4...3.9.5

body:
